description: Single storey rear extension( following existing demolition)side access door & reconfiguration of the windows to  the side elevation, and infill of an existing window.Single storey garden outbuilding.
decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title numbers: 243/00_001 (Location Plan); 243/00_003 (Existing Site Plan); 243/00_004 (Existing Floor Plans); 243/00_006 (Existing Elevations); 243/00_008 (Proposed Site Plan); 243/00_000 (Proposed Floor Plans); 243/00_010 (Proposed Outbuilding Floor Plan and Roof Plan); 243/00_012 (Proposed Elevations); 243/00_014 (Proposed Outbuilding Elevations)
REASON: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.

| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building and shall be consistent with those listed within the submitted application form and the drawings / plans as listed in Condition (2).

REASON: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 7.4 & 7B of the Development Management DPD (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and policies 1.1 (g), 2.1 (c) and 2.10 of the Adopted Core Strategy (2012).
| No part of the roof of the extension shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof garden, roof terrace or similar amenity area.

REASON: To protect the living conditions of nearby properties in accordance with policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021), polices 7.4, 7A & 7B of the Adopted Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013) and polices 1.1 (e)(g), 1.2 (f), 2.1(c) and 2.10 Adopted Development (Core) Strategy 2012.

| The outbuilding hereby permitted shall be used for domestic purposes incidental to the enjoyment of the main dwellinghouse at no. 8 Rosebery Gardens, West Ealing, W13 0HD, and not for any separate residential, industrial, commercial or business use. No cooking or kitchen facilities shall be installed into the outbuilding at any time.

REASON: To prevent the creation of a separate self-contained residential unit of accommodation in the interests of the living conditions of the existing and future residents of the site and to ensure that the building does not, by reason of any other activity, harm the living conditions in the area, in accordance with policies 1.1, 1.2, and 3.8 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), SPG 4, policies 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management Plan (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2019)
